name: Vox's Great Escape
description:
Made in two weeks, as an in class game jam!
We would love some feed back.

Vox has escaped from a bank with a safe, and police are hot on his tail trying to get the safe back!
Last as long as you can, evading the police, so Vox can keep the cash inside!

CONTROLS:

Hold left mouse to move 
Right mouse click to move faster
ESC to pause game

game by: 
Em, Leo & Francis
